DOC.brief_title: Humidified High Flow Nasal Cannula Versus Nasal Intermittent Positive Ventilation Neonates
DOC.detailed_description: Today new nursing principle propose kangaroo care neonate.Many study show kangaroo care may reduce pain、decrease respiratory heart rate among preterm infant.The recently study show benefit Physical Growth Neurodevelopment . Respiratory failure remain common problem neonatal intensive unit . As report early non-invasive ventilation accompany significant improvement subsequent lung development alveolation.Nasal continuous positive airway pressure ( NCPAP ) 、nasal intermittent positive pressure ventilation ( NIPPV ) humidify high flow via nasal cannula ( HHFNC ) non-invasive ventilation models.But Unfortunately , NIPPV NCPAP system always easily apply tolerated preterm infants.So convenient kangaroo care.Recently A meta analysis conclude NIPPV effective NCPAP preterms respiratory diseases.Maybe investigator reason NIPPV effective HHFNC , limit data comparison NIPPV HHFNC primary respiratory support neonate . The NIPPV group fail definition：1、FiO2 > 40 % 、MAP > 10 centimeter water column ( cm H2O ) , SaO2 < 90 % .2、significant abdominal distension.3、PaCO2 > 60 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) partial pressure arterial oxygen ( PaO2 ) < 45mmHg.4、severe apnea ( definition : > 6 episode require stimulation 6 hour require > 1 episode positive-pressure ventilation ) 5.potential hydrogen ( PH ) < 7.2 The HHFNC group fail definition：1、FiO2 > 40 % 、flow > 8 ( litre , L ) /min , SaO2 < 90 % .2、significant abdominal distension.3、PaCO2 > 60mmHg PaO2 < 45mmHg.4、severe apnea 5.PH < 7.2
DOC.criteria: 1 . Birth weight > 1000 gram > 28 week gestation 2. respiratory distress syndrome need assistant ventilation 1 . Birth weight < 1000 gram 2 .
